thread.title: THE LEARNED FAMILY, BOB , CARRIE , SAMANTHA , LAUR
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by THE LEARNED FAMILY, BOB , CARRIE , SAMANTHA , LAUR

author: THE LEARNED FAMILY, BOB , CARRIE , SAMANTHA , LAUR
title: THE LEARNED FAMILY, BOB , CARRIE , SAMANTHA , LAUR
text:
i have a wife, and two daughters, all with their own cars. the only place we will go is coles/ Mavis in .Oneida. they always check everything, let us know what needs to be done, and what will need to be done, not just the old "here..you need this " like other francises (monroe).
ted , and all the guys seem to really care. and i know i can trust my family's well being with them maintaining our vehicles
